GV03sb_08_u:1057: etāni sāmānyapaśyaṃstānyagāyaṃstaireṣu lokeṣu rasamupajīvanamadadhustathaivaitadyajamāno yadetāni sāmāni gāyatyeṣvevaitallokeṣu rasamupajīvanaṃ dadhāti
GV03sb_08_u:1059: ime vai lokāḥ svayamātṛṇā eṣvevaitallokeṣu rasamupajīvanaṃ dadhāti
GV03sb_08_u:1061: etāsu vyāhṛtiṣu gāyati bhūriti vā ayaṃ loko bhuva ityantarikṣalokaḥ svarityasau loka eṣvevaitallokeṣu rasamupajīvanaṃ dadhāti
GV03sb_08_u:1063: samānanidhanāni tāni yannānāprastāvāni nānā hyapaśyannatha yatsamānanidhanānyekā hyeva yajñasya pratiṣṭhaikaṃ nidhanaṃ svarga eva lokastasmātsvarjyotirnidhanāni
GV03sb_08_u:1069: purastādramyāṃ tanūm madhyato dadhāti rukbhaṃ ca puruṣaṃ cāthainametatsarvamevopariṣṭādramyayā tanvā pracādayati
GV03sb_08_u:1072: dadhāti pañca kṛtvaḥ pañcacitiko 'gniḥ pañca 'rtavaḥ saṃvatsaraḥ saṃvatsaro 'gniryāvānāgnaryāvatyasya mātrā tāvataivāsminnetadamṛtaṃ rūpamuttamaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1073: dadhāti sahasreṇa sarvaṃ vai sahasraṃ sarveṇaivāsminnetadamṛtaṃ rūpamuttamaṃ dadhāti
GV03sb_08_u:1075_0: athottarato dakṣiṇātha purastātpratyaṅṅatha jaghanena parītya dakṣiṇata udaṅ tiṣṭhaṃstaddakṣiṇāvṛttaddhi devatrāthānuparītya
GV03sb_08_u:1075_1: paścātprāṅ tiṣṭhaṃstatho hāsyaitatprāgeva karma kṛtam bhavati
GV03sb_08_u:1078: sahasrāya tveti sarvaṃ vai sahasraṃ sarvamasi sarvasmai tvetyetat
GV03sb_08_u:1080: ayameva lokaḥ prathamā citiḥ paśavaḥ purīṣaṃ yatprathamāṃ citim purīṣeṇa pracādayatīmaṃ tallokam paśubhiḥ pracādayati
GV03sb_08_u:1082: vayāṃsi purīṣaṃ yaddvitīyāṃ citim purīṣeṇa pracādayatyantarikṣaṃ tadvayobhiḥ pracādayati
GV03sb_08_u:1084: nakṣatrāṇi purīṣaṃ yattṛtīyāṃ citim purīṣeṇa pracādayati divaṃ tannakṣatraiḥ pracādayati
GV03sb_08_u:1086: dakṣiṇāḥ purīṣaṃ yaccaturthī citim purīṣeṇa pracādayati yajñam taddakṣinābhiḥ pracādayati
GV03sb_08_u:1088: prajā purīṣaṃ yatpañcamīṃ citim purīṣeṇa pracādayati yajamānaṃ tatprajayā pracādayati
GV03sb_08_u:1090: devāḥ purīṣaṃ yatṣaṣṭhīm citim purīṣeṇa pracādayati svargaṃ tallokaṃ devaiḥ pracādayati
GV03sb_08_u:1091: amṛtameva saptamī citiḥ tāmuttamāmupadadhātyamṛtaṃ tadasya sarvasyottamaṃ dadhāti tasmādasya sarvasyāmṛtamuttamaṃ tasmāddevā anantarhitāstasmādu te
GV03sb_08_u:1095_0: yaiveyam pratiṣṭhā yaścāyamavāṅ prāṇassatprathamā citirmāṃsam purīṣaṃ yatprathamāṃ citim purīṣeṇa pracādayatyetasya tadātmano
